Question.Ques: Which of the following is the correct name of React.js?
Which of the following are the advantages of React.js?
Question.Option1: React.js can increase the application's performance with Virtual DOM.
Question.Option2: React.js can render both on client and server side.
Question.Option3: React.js is easy to integrate with other frameworks such as Angular, BackboneJS since it is only a view library

Question.Ques: Which of the following is not a disadvantage of React.js?
Question.Option1: React.js has only a view layer. We have put your code for Ajax requests, events and so on.
Question.Option2: The library of React.js is pretty large.
Question.Option3: The JSX in React.js makes code easy to read and write.
Question.Option4: The learning curve can be steep in React.js.
